@concat(
  'SELECT * FROM ',
  pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table,
  ' WHERE SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP > CAST(''', 
  formatDateTime(variables('PreviousWatermark'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
  ''' AS DATETIME2)'

scripts.text:
DECLARE @today_ist datetime2(3) = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time';
DECLARE @chg TABLE(action nvarchar(10));

BEGIN TRAN;

-- 1) Expire rows where attributes changed
MERGE DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS AS T
USING (
  SELECT *
  FROM DWH.STG_CUSTOMER_DETAILS
) AS S
ON  T.INDEX_NUM   = S.INDEX_NUM
AND T.CUSTOMER_ID = S.CUSTOMER_ID
AND T.ROW_EXPIR_DT = '9999-12-31'
WHEN MATCHED AND ISNULL(S.HASH_DIFF,0x) <> ISNULL(T.HASH_DIFF,0x)
THEN UPDATE SET
  T.ROW_EXPIR_DT = DATEADD(day,-1,CAST(@today_ist AS date)),
  T.LST_UPD_TSTMP_IST = @today_ist
OUTPUT $action INTO @chg;

-- 2) Insert new versions for the rows just expired
INSERT INTO DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS
(
  INDEX_NUM, CUSTOMER_ID,
  FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, COMPANY, CITY, COUNTRY,
  PHONE_1, PHONE_2, EMAIL, SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, WEBSITE,
  HASH_DIFF, VERSION_NUM
)
SELECT
  S.INDEX_NUM, S.CUSTOMER_ID,
  S.FIRST_NAME, S.LAST_NAME, S.COMPANY, S.CITY, S.COUNTRY,
  S.PHONE_1, S.PHONE_2, S.EMAIL, S.SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, S.WEBSITE,
  S.HASH_DIFF, T.VERSION_NUM + 1
FROM DWH.STG_CUSTOMER_DETAILS S
JOIN DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS T
  ON T.INDEX_NUM = S.INDEX_NUM
 AND T.CUSTOMER_ID = S.CUSTOMER_ID
WHERE T.ROW_EXPIR_DT = DATEADD(day,-1,CAST(@today_ist AS date));

-- 3) Insert brand-new keys
MERGE DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS AS T
USING (
  SELECT *
  FROM DWH.STG_CUSTOMER_DETAILS
) AS S
ON  T.INDEX_NUM   = S.INDEX_NUM
AND T.CUSTOMER_ID = S.CUSTOMER_ID
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET
THEN INSERT
(
  INDEX_NUM, CUSTOMER_ID,
  FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, COMPANY, CITY, COUNTRY,
  PHONE_1, PHONE_2, EMAIL, SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, WEBSITE,
  HASH_DIFF, VERSION_NUM
)
VALUES
(
  S.INDEX_NUM, S.CUSTOMER_ID,
  S.FIRST_NAME, S.LAST_NAME, S.COMPANY, S.CITY, S.COUNTRY,
  S.PHONE_1, S.PHONE_2, S.EMAIL, S.SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, S.WEBSITE,
  S.HASH_DIFF, 1
)
OUTPUT $action INTO @chg;

COMMIT;

-- Return counts to ADF
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN action='INSERT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RowsInserted,
  SUM(CASE WHEN action='UPDATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RowsExpired
FROM @chg;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
 'SELECT ',
 '''DWH'' AS DIM_TAB_SCHEMA_NAME, ',
 '''DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS'' AS DIM_TABLE_NAME, ',
 '''CUSTOMER_ID'' AS BUSSINESS_ID_COL_NM, ',
 'INDEX_NUM, ',
 'CUSTOMER_ID AS BUSSINESS_ID ',
 'FROM ',
 pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table
)

scripts.text:
DECLARE @today_ist datetime2(3) = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time';

;WITH missing AS (
  SELECT D.INDEX_NUM, D.CUSTOMER_ID
  FROM DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS D
  WHERE D.ROW_EXPIR_DT = '9999-12-31'
  EXCEPT
  SELECT K.INDEX_NUM, K.CUSTOMER_ID
  FROM DWH.SRC_KEYS_CUSTOMER K
)
UPDATE D
   SET D.ROW_EXPIR_DT = DATEADD(day,-1,CAST(@today_ist AS date)),
       D.ROW_STS_CD   = 'D',
       D.LST_UPD_TSTMP_IST = @today_ist
FROM DWH.DIM_CUSTOMER_DETAILS D
JOIN missing M
  ON D.INDEX_NUM = M.INDEX_NUM
 AND D.CUSTOMER_ID = M.CUSTOMER_ID
WHERE D.ROW_EXPIR_DT = '9999-12-31';

SELECT @@ROWCOUNT AS RowsDeleted;

properties.description: It migrates the Oracle HR schema tables to an Azure SQL database with incremental runs.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
  'SELECT FILE_TABLE_ID, ',
  'RIGHT(SRC_SCHEMA_NAME, 7) AS SRC_SCHEMA_NAME, ',
  'RIGHT(TGT_SCHEMA_NAME, 9) AS TGT_SCHEMA_NAME, ',
  'SRC_NAME AS SRC_TBL_NAME, ',
  'TGT_NAME AS TGT_TBL_NAME ',
  'FROM FILE_TABLE_MAPPING ',
  'WHERE PIPLN_NM = ''', pipeline().Pipeline, ''' ',
  'AND ROW_STS_CD = ''A'''
)
@variables('SqlQuery')

value.value:
@concat(
  'SELECT ',
  'INDEX_NUM, CUSTOMER_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, COMPANY, CITY, COUNTRY, ',
  'PHONE_1, PHONE_2, EMAIL, SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, WEBSITE, ',
  'SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP, ',
  'HASHBYTES(''SHA2_256'', ',
    'CONCAT_WS(''|'', ',
      'ISNULL(FIRST_NAME, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LAST_NAME, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(COMPANY, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(CITY, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(COUNTRY, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(PHONE_1, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(PHONE_2, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(EMAIL, ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(30), SUBSCRIPTION_DATE,126), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(WEBSITE, '''')',
    ')',
  ') AS HASH_DIFF ',
  'FROM ', pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table, ' ',
  'WHERE SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP > CAST(''', 
    formatDateTime(variables('PreviousWatermark'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
  ''' AS DATETIME2)'
)

@concat(
  'SELECT ',
  'INDEX_NUM, CUSTOMER_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, COMPANY, CITY, COUNTRY, ',
  'PHONE_1, PHONE_2, EMAIL, SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, WEBSITE, ',
  'SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP, ',
  'HASHBYTES(''SHA2_256'', ',
  'CONCAT_WS(''|'', ',
    'ISNULL(FIRST_NAME,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(LAST_NAME,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(COMPANY,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(CITY,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(COUNTRY,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(PHONE_1,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(PHONE_2,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(EMAIL,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(30), SUBSCRIPTION_DATE,126),'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(WEBSITE,'''') ',
  ')) AS HASH_DIFF ',
  'FROM ', pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table
)

value.value:
@concat(
  'SELECT ',
  'INDEX_NUM,USR_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,SEX,EMAIL,PHONE,DATE_OF_BIRTH, ',
  'JOB_TITLE,SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP ',
  'HASHBYTES(''SHA2_256'', ',
    'CONCAT_WS(''|'', ',
    'ISNULL(FIRST_NAME,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(LAST_NAME,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(SEX,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(DATE_OF_BIRTH,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(JOB_TITLE,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(PHONE,'''') , ',
    'ISNULL(EMAIL,'''') , ',
  ')) AS HASH_DIFF ',
  'FROM ', pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema_name, '.', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table_name, ' ',
  'WHERE SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP > CAST(''', 
    formatDateTime(variables('PreviousWatermark'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
  ''' AS DATETIME2)'
)

@concat(
  'SELECT ',
  'INDEX_NUM,USR_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,SEX,EMAIL,PHONE,DATE_OF_BIRTH,',
  'JOB_TITLE, SRC_ROW_INSRT_TSTMP, ',
  'CONVERT(VARBINARY(32), HASHBYTES(''SHA2_256'', ',
    'CONCAT_WS(''|'', ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(FIRST_NAME)), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(LAST_NAME)), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(SEX)), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(CONVERT(nvarchar(30), DATE_OF_BIRTH, 126), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(JOB_TITLE)), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(PHONE)), ''''), ',
      'ISNULL(LTRIM(RTRIM(EMAIL)), '''')',
    ')',                 
  ')) AS HASH_DIFF ',   
  'FROM [', pipeline().parameters.p_src_schema_name, '].[', pipeline().parameters.p_src_table_name, ']'
)

activities.name: CreateTables
activities.description: Create Tables etl-oracle database in azure

scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE HR_JOBS (
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  JOB_TITLE NVARCHAR(35) NOT NULL,
  MIN_SALARY FLOAT,
  MAX_SALARY FLOAT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (JOB_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_REGIONS (
  REGION_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  REGION_NAME NVARCHAR(25),
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (REGION_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_COUNTRIES (
  COUNTRY_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  COUNTRY_NAME NVARCHAR(40),
  REGION_ID FLOAT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (COUNTRY_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_LOCATIONS (
  LOCATION_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  STREET_ADDRESS NVARCHAR(40),
  POSTAL_CODE NVARCHAR(12),
  CITY NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  STATE_PROVINCE NVARCHAR(25),
  COUNTRY_ID CHAR(2),
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (LOCATION_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_DEPARTMENTS (
  DEPARTMENT_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  DEPARTMENT_NAME NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  MANAGER_ID INT,
  LOCATION_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_EMPLOYEES (
  EMPLOYEE_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  FIRST_NAME NVARCHAR(20),
  LAST_NAME NVARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  EMAIL NVARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  PHONE_NUMBER NVARCHAR(20),
  HIRE_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  SALARY DECIMAL(8,2),
  COMMISSION_PCT DECIMAL(2,2),
  MANAGER_ID INT,
  DEPARTMENT_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_ID),
  UNIQUE (EMAIL),
  CHECK (salary > 0)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_JOB_HISTORY (
  EMPLOYEE_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  START_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  END_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  DEPARTMENT_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_ID, START_DATE),
  CHECK (end_date > start_date)
);
